name: Elemental Tempest
text: You are as inconstant as the wind on the sea, and yet you burn with passions to match a dragon’s ire. You embrace the chaos from which your people were born. Fire to blacken adamantine, water to wash away an armada, wind to freeze a dragon in flight, and lightning to blast a castle to rubble all flow through your spirit. You are a force of nature incarnate.

features.dualManifestation(11thLevel): You can use two elemental manifestations at the same time
features.elementalAttacks(11thLevel): Your elemental tempest attack powers deal a type of damage based on your current elemental manifestations
features.elementalSurge(11thLevel): Whenever you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can choose to adopt any one of the five elemental manifestations
features.tempestLord(16thLevel): If you have resistance to fire, cold, or lightning, increase each of those resistances by 5

flavorText: Kill me? You would better be served trying to cleave the wind, or quell a volcano’s fury. Can you slay a mountain?
